queries.name: Q1
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - show customers that share personal attributes (e.g. SSN, PhoneNumber, Address)

queries.name: Q2
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - show customers that share personal attributes (e.g. SSN, PhoneNumber, Address) that have opened accounts within X days of another account under a different identity

queries.name: Q3
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - Circular payments

queries.name: Q4
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - Payment chain
queries.comment: parameters selected by: MATCH (ah:AccountHolder:BusinessCustomer) WHERE (ah)-[:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO|ENTITY_RESOLUTION*1..4]->() RETURN ah.accountName ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 50

queries.name: Q4b
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - Payment chain

queries.name: Q5
queries.description: AML Query for cash transactions (Deposits) to separate account, transfer of combination of cash transactions to central (Yth) account, followed by wire to bank outside US

queries.name: Q6
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - rapid cash deposits

queries.name: Q7
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - rapid cash deposits/withdrawals

queries.name: Q9
queries.description: AML Query for Fraudulent Accounts - passthru payments (A)->(B)->(C), where $ amount >= $X between A and B and within y % in Between B to C

queries.name: Q10
queries.description: AML Query for local aggregators (a lot of incoming) which sent a few large transaction to one or more targeted nodes (for example HRG ñ High Risk Geolocations and / or HRE ñ High Risk Entities)

queries.name: Q11
queries.description: Potential Structuring in Cash and Equivalents (by grouping actors relationship). Looks across the Lookback Period for episodes where the aggregate of multiple daily transactions is above a given threshold.

queries.name: Q12
queries.description: Rapid Movement of Funds: All Activity. Customer who has received a huge wire and withdrawn most of it as cash via multiple ATM debits within a short period of time? (add relationships to show additional visibility).

queries.name: Q13
queries.description: Significant Change from Previous Activity. Find business customers whose cash deposit activity has gone from $50,000 a week to $250,000 a week over the course of a month

queries.name: Q14
queries.description: AML Integration: Find customers that get a lot of (ACH) deposits from external parties and then make substantial payments on Mortgages or Lines of Credit.

queries.name: Q15
queries.description: AML Integration:  Find accounts that wired a lot of money overseas either by a high percentage of deposits or via exceeding an aggregated threshold of 100K that also had a large number of deposits exceeding $9500.

queries.name: Q16
queries.description: The key to concentration is the pattern of a lot of smaller deposits followed by fewer larger withdrawals. For business customers, this can appear naturally as individual customer transactions would appear as small deposits whereas payments to suppliers would appear as fewer/larger withdrawals. The key then for business transactions is to ignore vetted businesses or to only find those that do withdrawals/transfers to high risk entities (unknown entities or entities that are not in the US).

queries.name: Custom Q1
queries.description: Count the number of ENTITY_RESOLUTION:s above a certain attributeScore threshold

queries.name: Custom Q2
queries.description: Find top payment sender/receiver pairs by number of payments

queries.name: Custom Q2B
queries.description: Find top payment sender/receiver pairs by number of payments (with explicit IS NOT NULL)

queries.name: Custom Q3
queries.description: Find payment sender/receiver pairs that made exactly 300 payments with large average payment amount, ordered by average payment amount

queries.name: Custom Q4
queries.description: Find payment sender/receiver pairs that made 10 or more payments with large average payment amount, ordered by average payment amount
